column4: how can i completly remove a packge in ubuntu? for example, when i do "apt-get remove mysql-server" then "apt-get install mysql-server" it doesnt prompt me the password for root!
how can i completly remove a packge in ubuntu? for example, when i do "apt-get remove mysql-server" then "apt-get install mysql-server" it doesnt prompt me the password for root!
yes, but no success, mysql install doesnt ask me the password for root again
